title: marvel skins
body: what if you do a marvel skins :3 that will be awesome :D

replies.body:
As far as i can tell, there are already several of these characters represented in the game. Of course they look sllightly different due to copyright issues.
Toxic Mundo is the Hulk,
Safecracker Eve is Black Widow
and Full Metal Jayce is Iron Man (because of the whole smooth bachelor scientist stuff)

At least as far as i understand them.

Also i think Pantheon would be far more suited for Captain A

But if they re-name them and change the optic just a little bit it IS possible(for example Chosen Yi [obviously Star wars ;)})

so nice idea :D
Dont think so. If its a really, really obvious copy it can still be punished, depending on how its used.
